message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with active learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The focus is on learning half-spaces, which is a common problem in classification tasks. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses theoretical guarantees and approximation algorithms, which are common in theoretical computer science, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category as well. The use of pools and comparisons to other approaches suggest cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as another possible sub-category. The application of half-space learning to computer vision (cs.CV) and social influence (cs.SI) are also mentioned in the paper, making them less likely but still possible sub-categories.
